channel.title: [PI]Very Weird Glitch need Help Bad *Desprite*[PI]
channel.description: Whats up guys I need help with my new boss i made. He is leveled in the 1200's (nex wannabe) n i buffed him up on all these attack styles (freeze, poison, stat reduction,etc) Hes perfect the only problem is... HE keeps hitting 1's even though i added his combat and hp in at Npc.cfg and the Max hit in spawn-config anyone can help please!:(

Hes perfect the only problem is… HE keeps hitting 1’s even though i added his combat and hp in at Npc.cfg and the Max hit in spawn-config anyone can help please!:([/quote]is his hp 1 aswell?
